page.title: 19Cardinal Matrix Broaches
page.content:
A group of us went to visit the factory and it was very noisy because there were lots of machines working. The broaches are not brooches which you wear but special tools.They are drills which cut very unusual holes and shapes into pieces of metal. Most of the parts that the tools cut go into cars and aeroplanes. The tools are sent to factories all around the world. {Helen A broach is a tool to make a difficult shaped hole.The factory is divided into six areas and there are 11o machines.They make 50 broaches per week and 2,500 per year.Safety first is very important.The men wear eye shields,overalls,safety gloves and boots.Only men work here. {Maria.
{
